:::{.callout-note collapse="false" title="Abstract"}
We demonstrate a cascaded Raman fiber laser with low intensity noise (\&lt;-104dBc/Hz, from 9kHz to 10GHz) and ~99\% spectral purity tunable over 6 Stokes orders, by using very low intensity noise, narrow linewidth pump source.
:::
